info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 1:53PM CST until December 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WILL BRING HEAVY SNOW TO MUCH OF THE AREA TONIGHT... .Precipitation from a slow moving storm system will change from rain and a wintry mix to snow tonight. The snow will be heavy at times, especially after midnight. Travel is expected to become hazardous overnight. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation changing to heavy snow. A total accumulation of 7 and 12 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep a flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
